page.title: 09POLICE
page.content: Southend central police station is the mainpolice station for the entire grid. It has a workforce of 134 personel, this includes policemen and policeweomen and civilian office staff. At their disposal they have 18 vehicals, including Ford Grenadas,Ford Sierras,Ford Escorts and Escort Vans,and Ford Transits. They also have 4 horses, which are used in searching woodland etc. where vehicles would be unsuitable, more commonly they are used for crowd control, processions and other public relation work. Southend has adopted a public liason police department, manned by 8 Neighbourghood Beat Officers. Each of these officers is responsible for approximately an electoral ward, and their job is to visit schools and to be seen on the street.
